entities.name: harry

entities.name: the prince

entities.name: lupin

entities.name: fleur

entities.description: A person whose singing is being imitated by Fleur.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who falls asleep quickly.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: A person whose expression is seen by everyone as a cue to go to bed.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The book that Harry is searching for information about.

relationships.description: Harry mentions that the Prince has helped him in Potions classes.
Lupin suggests to Harry that the age of a book might give a clue about when the Prince was at Hogwarts.
Fleur imitates Celestina singing a song.
